sentence: there are three boys standing in front of a table.
on the table are small black containers with plants growing out of them.
one of the containers is laying on it s side and dirt is spilling out.
the first boy is holding up a soda bottle for the others to see.
inside the bottle is a few layers of soil and a plant growing out the top.
the boy in the red and grey shirt is holding the bottle together.
the boys are outside in the yard.
the boy in the yellow mustard shirt has his hand on his hips.
the black small containers are sitting on top of the newspaper.
